name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring extensive expertise in modern **TypeScript** and **Node.js** development, particularly focusing on **microservices** and **distributed systems**. My strong technical skills also encompass **gRPC**, **REST**, and **Kafka** technologies to build scalable and high-performance APIs. I have a proven track record in implementing **serverless architectures** and ensuring robust **observability** and **performance** across applications.

In addition to my core backend capabilities, I specialize in database management with **PostgreSQL** and emphasize rigorous **testing** and **technical communication** within teams. My past experience includes leading projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with key standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am also dedicated to mentoring junior developers, fostering a culture of learning and innovation.
